Submodules¶

src.validations.ArgsValidator module¶

Validation module contains the enum class StorageType that maps to internal representation the connection strings. StorageType values are used later in manager factory. Prefix for ftp, zip and regex for validating ftp string pattern are also set here.

class src.validations.ArgsValidator.ArgsValidator(argv: list[str])[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used for validating

Validates that the arguments match the regex/represent valid paths in the system depending on the platform and storage type

Attributes¶

argvlist

Arguments representing the locations to be synced

Methods¶

validate()

Maps the args the matching StorageType value

is_valid_ftp(conn_string: str)

Checks whether the ftp connection string matches regex format

is_valid_zip(path: str)

Checks whether the zip exists and is not corrupted

is_valid_folder(path: str)

Checks whether the folder exists

static is_valid_folder(path: str) → bool[source]¶

Checks whether the path is a folder.

Parameters¶

pathstr

Path to folder

Returns¶

bool

Path is a folder

static is_valid_ftp(conn_string: str) → bool[source]¶

Checks whether the connection string is ftp matches regex.

Parameters¶

conn_stringstr

Connection string provided for usage of ftp, having a specific format consisting of: ftp:my_user:my_pass@URL[/folder].

Returns¶

bool

Regex matches conn_string or not

static is_valid_zip(path: str) → bool[source]¶

Checks whether the path is a valid .zip file.

Parameters¶

pathstr

Path to zip file

Returns¶

bool

Path is a valid .zip file

validate() → tuple[src.validations.ArgsValidator.StorageType][source]¶

Maps the arguments to the matching storage type held in ~validations.ArgsValidator.StorageType.

Returns¶

location_typestuple

Contains the matching StorageType object for every argv provided

Raises¶

ValidationException

Class was instantiated with either wrong args or wrong number of args.

class src.validations.ArgsValidator.StorageType(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]¶

Class used as enum representing the type of storage

FOLDER = 3¶

Module contents¶

Package that provides validation for command-line arguments. Specific exceptions are also implemented in exceptions sub-package.
